title: The Batman movie: Release date, cast, plot, villains, Matt Reeves comments
text:

It's almost time for a new solo adventure for the Caped Crusader.

That's right, Batman is getting his next standalone movie that will focus on the DC Comics icon in his younger and more vulnerable years.

The film was originally due to feature DCEU star Ben Affleck back in the role, but he has now departed cape and cowl for good, leaving speculation rampant over what look and tone the new instalment will take in his absence.

Director Matt Reeves is now the man to helm this new film, but what should we expect from the film?

With all the casting talk, the biggest question is when The Batman will be hitting cinemas.

Here is everything you need to know about The Batman.

The Batman movie release date

The Batman is due to be released in US cinemas on June 25, 2021.

A UK release date has yet to be confirmed.

The Batman movie cast

Robert Pattinson as Batman/Bruce Wayne

(Image: Splash News)

It has been confirmed that the former Twilight star will be the one to wear the cape and owl in the new outing for the Dark Knight.

Zoë Kravitz as Catwoman/Selina Kyle

(Image: Splash)

The Big Little Lies star has been cast as the anti-heroine and femme fatale.

Jeffrey Wright as Commissioner James Gordon

It also looks like we have a new head of Gotham City Police Department and ally to Batman, as Westworld star Jeffrey Wright takes on the role.

Jonah Hill

The Oscar-nominated star of Moneyball will likely have a role in the film according to reports.

The Batman plot

(Image: Warner Bros)

It is believed that the film will be set in the 1990s and will follow a younger iteration of Batman as he focuses on a mystery that requries him to use his detective skills.

The Batman looks to get under the skin of the Caped Crusader and see what makes him tick.

It is believed he will face off with an assortment of foes in the film.

The Batman villains

(Image: Warner Brothers)

Director Matt Reeves has revealed that a rogues gallery of villains will appear in the film for the Dark Knight to face.

"You can't have Batman without a villain. There will be a rogues gallery."

The latest reports indicate that two of these villains will be The Penguin and Catwoman, who previously appeared as central antagonists together in the 1992 film Batman Returns.

We now have Zoe Kravitz on board as Catwoman.

Matt Reeves' comments

(Image: Getty Images Europe)

Director Matt Reeves has spoken about what the focus of the film will be and the style it will take.

"It's very much a point-of-view-driven, noir Batman tale," he told The Hollywood Reporter.

"It's told very squarely on his shoulders, and I hope it's going to be a story that will be thrilling but also emotional.

"It's more Batman in his detective mode than we've seen in the films."

Colour us excited!

The Batman is released in US cinemas on June 25, 2021.
description: The Batman movie is on its way from director Matt Reeves and here is when you can expect the new movie for the Caped Crusader
